Description:
KEY REQUIREMENTSSuccessfully completed a 3-4 years full time technical qualification in automobile engineering (NVQ level 04 or above) from a recognized institute (German Tech, AETI, NAITA, City & Guilds, NDT, HNDE, NDES).
Minimum 07 years of working experience in the automotive industry in which 3 years should be in the similar capacity.
Good leadership and communication skills with a decent knowledge in financials.   Job Details
